mapper.update: update trade_fee_history set biz_code = #{bizCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_coin = #{baseCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_coin = #{tradeCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, broker_fee = #{brokerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, exchange_fee = #{exchangeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, biz_code, base_coin, trade_coin, broker_fee, exchange_fee, effective_time, expire_time, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id from trade_fee_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, biz_code, base_coin, trade_coin, broker_fee, exchange_fee, effective_time, expire_time, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id from trade_fee_history
